about_the_game:
Science Gallery

This Science-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Discover the inner workings of the world around us with this scientific pack!

Wrap and weave images of a scientific nature!

Contents

The Science gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Prism
  • Magnet
  • Test Tube
  • Titration
  • Radiation
  • Electricity
  • Temperature
  • Bunsen Burner
  • Safety First
  • Atom
  • Doppler Effect
  • Water Cycle
  • Plant Cell
  • Petri Dish
  • Benzene
  • Pharmacy
  • Aerodynamics
  • Photosynthesis
  • Bacteria
  • Volcano
  • The Core

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

  • OS *: Windows 8.1

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
